select * from lamp_statistics where id = #{id}

select lamp_id as id, avg(is_online) as avg_online, count(is_light) as online, avg(is_fault) as avg_fault, count(is_fault) as fault, avg(is_light) as avg_light, count(is_light) as light, sum(energy) as energy, max(update_time) as update_time from lamp_statistics where date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') = date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), interval 1 day) and region_id = #{id} group by lamp_id;
